title: @Riot are you supposed to be able to unlock skins during champ select?
body:
I went to go and unlock the best {{champion:67}} Skin (aristocrate ;) ) while i was in champ select and It said error, It gave me the option to do it and I know  I had enough LP it just wouldn't work.
So is this a bug or are you just not supposed to be able too?

replies.body: I've actually been having this issue for months

Hey! 

You should be able to purchase a skin with RP during champion select. I just went ahead and verified this by purchasing Dragon Trainer Tristana after locking in. If you have this issue again, please let me know! ^-^
I believe I read they are fixing that with the new Champ Select. You're supposed to already be able to.
